results.title: Evaluation of some pharmaceutical formulations of lisinopril through dissolution testing.
results.journal: Rev Med Chir Soc Med Nat Iasi
results.text_hl: ...AIM: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ is a drug of the angiotensin converting enzyme (ACE) inhibitor class that is primarily used in treatment of @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@, @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@congestive heart failure@@@, @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@heart attacks@@@ and also in preventing @<m>DISEASE_Retinal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012164 @@@renal and retinal complications@@@ of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@.

citations.NLM: Vieriu M, Bibire N, Apostu M, Tocu C, Dorneanu V, Vlase C. Evaluation of some pharmaceutical formulations of lisinopril through dissolution testing. Rev Med Chir Soc Med Nat Iasi. 2010 Jul-Sep;114(3):900-3. PMID: 21235127
citations.BibTeX: @article{21235127, title={Evaluation of some pharmaceutical formulations of lisinopril through dissolution testing.}, author={Vieriu M and Bibire N and Apostu M and Tocu C and Dorneanu V and Vlase C}, journal={Rev Med Chir Soc Med Nat Iasi}, volume={114}, number={3}, pages={900-3}}

results.title: Systematic review on urine albumin testing for early detection of diabetic complications.
results.text_hl: However, among @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ not stratified by @DISEASE_Albuminuria @DISEASE_MESH:D000419 @@@albuminuria@@@, improved glycaemic control benefits @<m>DISEASE_Retinal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012164 @@@retinal and renal complications@@@ and may benefit @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@CVD@@@.

citations.NLM: Newman DJ, Mattock MB, Dawnay AB, Kerry S, McGuire A, Yaqoob M, Hitman GA, Hawke C. Systematic review on urine albumin testing for early detection of diabetic complications. Health Technol Assess. 2005 Aug;9(30):iii-vi, xiii-163. PMID: 16095545
